attributes.TECHNICAL_DESCR:
H2-Fifty is a 250 MW water electrolysis plant in the Port of Rotterdam.

It is expected to produce up to 0.040 Mt/y (>100 tonnes H2/day green hydrogen) from renewable electricity.

The green hydrogen will be supplied via hydrogen backbones to Europe's second largest refinery (bp Europoort) and other customers in industry and mobility across the Netherlands and Germany.

The renewable electricity will be supplied via Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) compliant with the EU’s Renewable Energy Directive and will source particularly electricity from Dutch offshore wind farms.
attributes.IMPLEMENTATION_STATUS_DESCR: Planned but not yet in permitting
